tasks.name: Create Inline Editor component
tasks.description: Create inline editor component that allows clicking on table cells to edit directly.

instructions.details: Create inline-editor.js component. Implement click-to-edit functionality. Add save on blur/Enter key, cancel with Escape. Add visual edit indicators (highlight, border). Support text, select, date input types. Integrate with validation service.

tasks.name: Create Audit Viewer component
tasks.description: Create audit viewer component to display audit logs and change history.

instructions.details: Create audit-viewer.js component. Display audit logs from enhanced logger. Add filtering by user, date range, field. Add search functionality. Add export to CSV. Integrate with enhanced-logger.js service. This depends on TASK-1.2.1 (Enhanced Logger).

tasks.name: Create Dashboard component
tasks.description: Create dashboard component with KPI cards and real-time updates.

instructions.details: Create dashboard.js component. Display top 5-7 KPIs in card layout. Add real-time updates using Firebase Realtime Database. Make cards clickable to navigate to detailed views. Use responsive grid layout. Integrate with KPI Calculator and Chart Service.

tasks.name: Create Kanban View component
tasks.description: Create kanban board view with columns for status/disposition and drag-and-drop functionality.

instructions.details: Create kanban-view.js component. Add columns for each status/disposition. Implement drag-and-drop between columns using HTML5 Drag and Drop API. Add card view with key information. Add filtering. Add real-time updates. Integrate with state manager and view controller.
